meanings.definition: Relating to or involving a mutation.
meanings.sent1: The scientist studied the mutational changes in the DNA.
meanings.sent2: The doctor explained that the patient's condition was due to a mutational error.
meanings.sent3: The mutational mix-up in the genetic code led to some unexpected results.
meanings.sent4: Her artistic style underwent a mutational shift after taking a new class.
meanings.sent5: The mutational process can sometimes lead to beneficial adaptations in organisms.

meanings.definition: Resulting from or caused by a mutation.
meanings.sent1: The mutational trait was passed down through generations.
meanings.sent2: The abnormal growth was identified as a mutational anomaly.
meanings.sent3: The mutational glitch in the system caused chaos in the experiment.
meanings.sent4: His mutational behavior surprised everyone at the party.
meanings.sent5: The mutational effect of the chemical exposure was evident in the lab results.
